mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT B.OBNUM, B.OBDATE, C.STATUS FROM ORDER_BUY B, ORDER_DETAIL D, DELIVERY_CHECK C WHERE B.OBNUM=D.OBNUM AND C.OBNUM=B.OBNUM AND B.ID=#{id} ORDER BY B.OBDATE DESC
SELECT STATUS, COUNT(*) CNT FROM DELIVERY_CHECK WHERE MEMID=#{id} GROUP BY STATUS

SELECT B.OBNUM, B.OBDATE, C.STATUS FROM ORDER_BUY B, ORDER_DETAIL D, DELIVERY_CHECK C WHERE B.OBNUM=D.OBNUM AND B.ID=#{id} AND C.OBNUM=B.OBNUM AND C.STATUS=#{status} GROUP by B.OBNUM, B.OBDATE, C.STATUS ORDER BY B.OBDATE DESC
SELECT B.OBNUM, B.OBDATE, B.OBWAY, B.OBCARDN, B.PRICE, C.STATUS FROM ORDER_BUY B, DELIVERY_CHECK C WHERE C.OBNUM=B.OBNUM AND B.OBNUM=#{obNum}
SELECT D.PRODNUM, D.PRODNAME, D.QUANTITY, D.PRICE, D.COLOR, D.PRODOPTION, D.FILENAME, C.STATUS FROM ORDER_DETAIL D, DELIVERY_CHECK C WHERE D.OBNUM=C.OBNUM AND D.OBNUM=#{obNum}

INSERT INTO ORDER_BUY(OBNUM, ID, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, OBNAME, OBPHONE,OBADDRESS, OBMES, OBWAY, OBCARDN, OBDATE, OBTAKEBACK, OBEXCHANGE,DELIVERYCOST) VALUES(OBNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{name},#{quantity},#{price},#{obName},#{obPhone},#{obAddress}, #{obMes},#{obWay},#{obCardN},SYSDATE,#{obTakeback},#{obExchange},#{deliveryCost})
SELECT OBNUM_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL(ODNUM, OBNUM, PRODNUM, PRODNAME, QUANTITY , PRICE,COLOR, PRODOPTION, FILENAME, WEIGHT) VALUES(ODNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{obNum}, #{prodNum}, #{prodName}, #{quantity}, #{price},#{color},'',#{filename}, #{weight} )
SELECT ODNUM_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO DELIVERY_CHECK(DCNUM,OBNUM,MEMID,STATUS,CHECKDATE) VALUES(DCNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{obNum}, #{memId}, #{status},SYSDATE)
SELECT DCNUM_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
